name: Stars and Strips Quilt~PDF Pattern
description:
This quilt design is called Stars and Strips, An Original Design by Stacey Carey.
It measures approximately 60" x 72".
The fabric used is Simple Abundance by Bonnie and Camille for Moda.
This listing is for a pdf pattern, not the actual quilt.

The PDF will be emailed to you. PLEASE specify your email address in note to seller when you checkout. Your PDF will be sent within 48 hours of confirmation of payment from PayPal.

ALL SALES ARE FINAL
All rights reserved.
No portion of this pattern may be reproduced
without expressed written permission by the author.
